sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Grid, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Button } from '@mui/material';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
// import RBACImage from './assets/rbac_image.jpg';
import './Home.css';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ backgroundColor: '#f4f7fc', padding: '30px 0' }}>
      {/* Header Section */}
      <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '40px' }}>
        <Typography variant="h3" sx={{ color: '#1976d2', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
          Welcome to the RBAC System
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ marginTop: '10px', color: '#555' }}>
          Explore Role-Based Access Control and its Application in Modern Systems
        </Typography>
      </Box>

      {/* Main Content Section */}
      <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ marginBottom: '40px' }}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Card sx={{ maxWidth: 345 }}>
            <CardMedia
              component="img"
              height="140"
              image={RBACImage}
              alt="RBAC Overview"
            />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography variant="h5" component="div" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#1976d2' }}>
                What is RBAC?
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) is a system for managing access to resources in a network. It ensures that
                users have only the permissions necessary for their role, minimizing security risks and enhancing efficiency.
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Card sx={{ maxWidth: 345 }}>
            <CardMedia
              component="img"
              height="140"
              image={RBACImage}
              alt="RBAC Benefits"
            />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography variant="h5" component="div" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#1976d2' }}>
                Benefits of RBAC
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                RBAC helps to ensure that sensitive data is protected by restricting user access. It also helps streamline
                administrative control by assigning users to predefined roles with specific access levels.
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      {/* Detailed Information about RBAC */}
      <Box sx={{ padding: '20px 10%', backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '8px', boxShadow: 2 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ color: '#1976d2', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '20px' }}>
          How RBAC Works
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ lineHeight: 1.8 }}>
          Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) is widely used to manage user permissions across various systems. By assigning users to roles (such as Admin, User, Guest), administrators can control access to resources efficiently. Each role is assigned a set of permissions, which define what a user in that role can or cannot do. RBAC ensures that the least privilege principle is maintained, ensuring users only have access to resources necessary for their tasks.
        </Typography>
      </Box>

      {/* Call to Action */}
      <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '40px' }}>
        <Link to="/dashboard">
          <Button variant="contained" sx={{ backgroundColor: '#1976d2', color: 'white', padding: '10px 20px' }}>
            Go to Dashboard
          </Button>
        </Link>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
